name: Neon Fury
summary: "Neon Fury" is a VR game, created for high-end VR devices (PSVR, Vive and Rift) that puts the player on the front lines of tower defense game (a “First Person Tower Defense”). The game takes place on a landfill planet where you build up wacky towers and use your handheld weapons to protect your base from thieving cyber-punk enemies, machine gun armed T-Rex's, and exploding cyber-chickens! Neon Fury takes full advantage of the VR medium to immerse the player in the middle of the battle, in order to experience a Tower Defense game like never before.
